glosses: ultimately, in conclusion, as a result

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish نتهكم (netekim, nitekim, “even as, as, just as”) (alternatively; نتهكیم, نتهكه (neteke, niteke/ki)), from نته (nete, nite, “even”), from Proto-Turkic *nēteg, from the combination of *nē (“what”) + *teg (“as, as much”). Compare Karakhanid نَتَكْ (neteg, netek, “how, in what way, how much”).
